name: noems
text: di ba ung pasmado ung nanginginig na ang kamay? and the oldies would tell us  not to wet our hands after ironing...  or to not take a shower right after a  strenuous activity dahil 'baka ma pasma'?i was about to say that doctors dont believe in the concept of pasma until you  mentioned a scientific name for it...  unless its for 'sweaty hands' and not  the pasma am referring to?anyhow...  tama si pen, just pee on it. hehe
